definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

pinyin: bi4 bu4 ke3 shao3 zu3 cheng2

sentences.english: Some of the authorization roles mandate that people are assigned to them.
sentences.chinese: 一些授权角色是必不可少的，这些角色上分配了人员。
蔗糖是日常饮食中必不可少的。

sentences.english: The checking of edge matching for map sheets is necessary for surveying and mapping production.
sentences.chinese: 图幅数据的接边检查在测绘生产中是必不可少的工序。

sentences.english: Usually physical and often sustained for up to sixteen hours a day. It wasn’t easy, but hard work mattered.
sentences.chinese: 在那时候每天连续工作16个小时是必不可少的。

sentences.english: Learning basic footwork in Manipuri dance is essential.
sentences.chinese: 学习舞蹈的基本步法在曼尼普尔是必不可少的。

sentences.english: In particular, there are two technology resources that I believe are non-negotiable essentials.
sentences.chinese: 我认为其中有两项技术资源是必不可少的。

sentences.english: The germination of weed seeds was effeeted by the soil moisture and temperature.
sentences.chinese: 温度和土壤湿度都是杂草发生必不可少的重要条件。

sentences.english: The condiments vary from family to family, but fresh chili powder is a must-have.
sentences.chinese: 调料的口味各家不同，只有现磨的干辣椒粉必不可少。

sentences.english: It is necessary for the students who learning the major of secretaryship to practise teaching.
sentences.chinese: 实践教学环节对文秘专业学生的培养必不可少。

sentences.english: Thus, a diving watch or a marine watch is an essential company.
sentences.chinese: 此时，潜航系列腕表就成为了必不可少的伴侣。

sentences.english: Failure is an essential step towards success.
sentences.chinese: 失败是迈向成功之路所必不可少的。

sentences.english: Disappoinment is a natural part of life.
sentences.chinese: 失望是人生必不可少的一部分。

sentences.english: The calibration of thermocouples plays a very important part in its using process.
sentences.chinese: 热电偶的检定是其使用过程中必不可少的工作环节。

sentences.english: In some cases kerning is inevitable and necessary.
sentences.chinese: 有些场合这种字距调整是必不可少的。

sentences.english: Data compression has been a technique of indispensability in times of information.
sentences.chinese: 数据压缩已经成为信息时代必不可少的一项技术。

sentences.english: These little arguments were part and parcel of their relationship.
sentences.chinese: 这些小吵小闹是他们相处时必不可少的内容。

definition: see 必不可少[bi4 bu4 ke3 shao3]
cannot do without/to be unavoidable/are bound to be many
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
not a single one is dispensable/can't do without either
first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
